column6: Collateral damage is no object to a ruthless stranger, who continues working his way down a list of targets.  A pattern is emerging, and Nick Fury wants answers.  Meanwhile, tensions between Iron Man and the New Avengers ratchet up to the breaking point.
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | colorist:Edgar Delgado | penciller (cover):Adi Granov | inker:Scott Hanna | writer:Charles Knauf | writer:Daniel Knauf | penciller:Patrick Zircher
